list.title: Circle
list.description: Create a circle.

list.title: Circle#addToSVG
list.description: Add this Circle to an SVG Element.

list.title: LCG
list.description: Creates an instance of LCG.

list.title: LCG#maxValue
list.description: Returns the maximum possible value of the LCG.

list.title: LCG#next
list.description: Generates the next psuedo-random number.

list.title: Line
list.description: Create a line between two [Vectors]{@link Vector}.

list.title: Line#addToSVG
list.description: Add a line to an SVG element

list.title: Line#isContainedBy
list.description: Check if this line lies directly on top of a longer line.

list.title: Line#isDuplicate
list.description: Check if this line is the same as another line.

list.title: Line#length
list.description: Get the length.

list.title: Line.fromArray
list.description: Create a Line from an array of numbers.

list.title: Mulberry32
list.description: Creates an instance of Mulberry32.

list.title: Mulberry32#maxValue
list.description: Returns the maximum possible value of Mulberry32.

list.title: Mulberry32#next
list.description: Generates the next psuedo-random number.

list.title: PRNG
list.description: This class is intended to be extended by specific implementations such as {@link LCG}, {@link Mulberry32} or {@link XORShift32}.

list.title: PRNG#maxValue
list.description: Returns the maximum possible value that the PRNG can generate.

list.title: PRNG#next
list.description: Generates the next psuedo-random number.

list.title: PRNG#randomBipolarFloat
list.description: Generate a random float in the range [-1, 1).

list.title: PRNG#randomChance
list.description: Returns a boolean based on a specified probability.

list.title: PRNG#randomElement
list.description: Select a random element from an array.

list.title: PRNG#randomFloat
list.description: Generate a random float in the range [0, 1).

list.title: PRNG#randomInteger
list.description: Generate a random integer from a specified range of values.

list.title: PRNG#randomWeighted
list.description: Selects an option probabalistically from a set of weighted choices.

list.title: Path#addToSVG
list.description: Add this path to an SVG element. Called by {@link Sketch#addPathsToSVG} inside {@link Sketch#draw}.

list.title: Quadtree
list.description: Create a quadtree.

list.title: Quadtree#insert
list.description: Add a point into this quadtree.

list.title: Quadtree#query
list.description: Check for points in a given range and return them in an array.

list.title: Quadtree#show
list.description: For each boundary of this quadtree and all it's children, create [Lines]{@link Line} from those rectangles and add them to a {@link Sketch}.

list.title: Rectangle
list.description: Create a rectangle using centre position, width, and height.

list.title: Rectangle#contains
list.description: Check if this rectangle contains a {@link Vector}.

list.title: Rectangle#intersects
list.description: Check if this rectangle intersects another rectangle.

list.title: Rectangle#lines
list.description: Create an array of [Lines]{@link Line} containing a line for each side of the rectangle.

list.title: Rectangle.fromCorners
list.description: Create a rectangle from four corner [Vectors]{@link Vector}.

list.title: Sketch#add
list.description: Adds shapes to the sketch.

list.title: Sketch#addCirclesToSVG
list.description: Adds the [Circles]{@link Circle} in this Sketch's circles array to it's SVG element.

list.title: Sketch#addLinesToSVG
list.description: Adds the [Lines]{@link Line} in this Sketch's lines array to it's SVG element.

list.title: Sketch#addPathsToSVG
list.description: Adds the [Paths]{@link Path} in this Sketch's paths array to it's SVG element.

list.title: Sketch#addSingleShape
list.description: Adds a single shape to the appropriate array.

list.title: Sketch#appendSVG
list.description: Appends this sketch's SVG element to the document body.

list.title: Sketch#clear
list.description: Empty out any existing HTML UI and SVG document elements on the page, in order to regenerate a Sketch.

list.title: Sketch#createUI
list.description: Creates HTML UI and adds it to the document body.

list.title: Sketch#deduplicateLines
list.description: Removes duplicated [Lines]{@link Line} from this Sketch's lines array.

list.title: Sketch#downloadSVG
list.description: Download the {@link Sketch} as an SVG file.

list.title: Sketch#draw
list.description: Generates the SVG and UI and appends them to the document body. Must be called after defining a Sketch.generate() function.

list.title: Sketch#removeOverlappingLines
list.description: Removes overlapping [Lines]{@link Line} from this Sketch's lines array.

list.title: Sketch#removeShortLines
list.description: Removes [Lines]{@link Line} in this Sketch's lines array that are shorter than a specified minimum length.

list.title: Vector
list.description: Create a vector from coordinates.

list.title: Vector#add
list.description: Add a vector to this vector.

list.title: Vector#clone
list.description: Make a copy of this vector.

list.title: Vector#distance
list.description: Calculate the distance to another vector from this vector

list.title: Vector#equals
list.description: Check if this vector is equivalent to another vector.

list.title: Vector#getAngle
list.description: Get the angle of this vector with respect to the positive x-axis.

list.title: Vector#getMagnitude
list.description: Get the magnitude of this vector.

list.title: Vector#isOnLine
list.description: Check if this vector is a point on a {@link Line}.

list.title: Vector#multiply
list.description: Multiply this vector by a scalar.

list.title: Vector#nearestNeighbour
list.description: Finds the n nearest neighbours to this vector, from a given array of vectors.

list.title: Vector#normalize
list.description: Normalize this vector by setting it's magnitude to 1.

list.title: Vector#rotate
list.description: Rotate this vector by a specified angle.

list.title: Vector#setMagnitude
list.description: Set the magnitude of this vector.

list.title: Vector#subtract
list.description: Subtract a vector from this vector.

list.title: Vector.add
list.description: Add two vectors.

list.title: Vector.cross
list.description: Calculate the cross product of two 2D vectors.

list.title: Vector.distance
list.description: Calculate the distance between two vectors.

list.title: Vector.dot
list.description: Calculate the dot product of two vectors.

list.title: Vector.fromAngle
list.description: Create a vector from an angle.

list.title: Vector.fromArray
list.description: Create a vector from an array.

list.title: Vector.lerp
list.description: Linear interpolation between vectors.

list.title: Vector.subtract
list.description: Subtract two vectors.

list.title: XORShift32#maxValue
list.description: Returns the maximum possible value of XORShift32.

list.title: XORShift32#next
list.description: Generates the next psuedo-random number.

list.title: createSVG
list.description: Create an SVG element.

list.title: decToHex
list.description: Convert a decimal number into a hexadecimal string.

list.title: hexToDec
list.description: Convert a hexadecimal string to a decimal number.

list.title: intersectionLineLine
list.description: Check if two lines intersect.

list.title: lerp
list.description: Linear interpolation between two values

list.title: map
list.description: Re-maps a number from one range to another.

list.title: sinFract
list.description: Generate pseudo-random numbers from x and y co-ordinates

list.title: unseededRandomHex
list.description: Uses Math.random() to make a hexadecimal string for setting the seed of a {@link Sketch} to be used in a seedable {@link PRNG} such as {@link LCG}

list.title: wrap
list.description: Constrain an input number to within a specified range, and wrapping it around to min when it exceeds max (and vice versa)
